parts.text:
Magpie

```json
{
  "application": "Magpie",
  "software": [
    {
      "name": "Spark",
      "version": "3.0.3-bin-hadoop3.2",
      "setup_type": "STANDALONE",
      "home": "${HOME}/spark-${SPARK_VERSION}",
      "local_dir": "/tmp/${USER}/spark",
      "conf_files": "${HOME}/myconf",
      "worker_cores_per_node": 8,
      "worker_memory_per_node": 16000,
      "worker_directory": "/tmp/${USER}/spark/work",
      "job_memory": "2048",
      "driver_memory": "2048",
      "daemon_heap_max": 2000,
      "environment_extra_path": "${HOME}/spark-my-environment",
      "job": "sparkpi",
      "default_parallelism": 8,
      "memory_fraction": 0.6,
      "memory_storage_fraction": 0.5,
      "storage_memory_fraction": 0.6,
      "shuffle_memory_fraction": 0.2,
      "rdd_compress": true,
      "io_compression_codec": "lz4",
      "deploy_spreadout": true,
      "job_classpath": "",
      "job_library_path": "",
      "job_java_opts": "",
      "local_scratch_dir": "/lustre/${USER}/sparkscratch/",
      "local_scratch_dir_clear": "yes",
      "network_timeout": 120,
      "yarn_staging_dir": "file:///lustre/${USER}/sparkStaging/",
      "sparkpi_slices": 4,
      "sparkwordcount_file": "file:///path/mywordcountfile",
      "sparkwordcount_copy_in_file": "file:///mywordcountinfile"
    },
    {
      "name": "Hadoop",
      "version": "3.2",
      "setup_type": "MR"
    },
    {
      "name": "Zookeeper"
    },
    {
      "name": "Python",
      "version": "",
      "path": "/usr/bin/python"
    },
    {
      "name": "Java",
      "version": "1.8.0",
      "home": "/usr/lib/jvm/jre-1.8.0/"
    }
  ],
  "resource_requirements": [
    {
      "name": "nodes",
      "value": "<my_node_count>"
    },
    {
      "name": "time",
      "value": "<my_time_in_minutes>"
    },
    {
      "name": "job_name",
      "value": "<my_job_name>"
    },
    {
      "name": "partition",
      "value": "<my_partition>"
    }
  ],
  "other_configuration": {
    "scripts_home": "${HOME}/magpie",
    "local_dir": "/tmp/${USER}/magpie",
    "job_type": "spark",
    "job_script": "${HOME}/my-job-script",
    "startup_time": 30,
    "shutdown_time": 30,
    "one_time_run": "yes",
    "pre_job_run": "${MAGPIE_SCRIPTS_HOME}/scripts/pre-job-run-scripts/my-pre-job-script",
    "post_job_run": "${MAGPIE_SCRIPTS_HOME}/scripts/post-job-run-scripts/my-post-job-script",
    "pre_execute_run": "${MAGPIE_SCRIPTS_HOME}/scripts/pre-job-run-scripts/my-pre-job-script",
    "post_execute_run": "${MAGPIE_SCRIPTS_HOME}/scripts/post-job-run-scripts/my-post-job-script",
    "environment_variable_script": "${HOME}/my-job-env",
    "environment_variable_script_shell": "/bin/bash",
    "remote_cmd": "ssh",
    "remote_cmd_opts": ""
  }
}
```

This JSON object provides a structured representation of the script's functionality, detailing:

* **application**: The main application being used, Magpie in this case.
* **software**: A list of software used by the script, including their versions, configuration options, and paths. 
* **resource_requirements**: Information about the resources needed by the script, like the number of nodes, time limit, job name, and partition.
* **other_configuration**: Miscellaneous configurations, such as script paths, directory locations, job type, and runtime options. 

This format makes it easier to understand the dependencies and configuration requirements of the script.
